mapper.select: select sum(case when t.error_flag = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as failureEntities, sum(case when t.error_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as successEntities, #{transactionUUID} as batch_number from exp_adjust_line_temp t where t.batch_number = #{transactionUUID}
select t.row_index, t.error_msg from exp_adjust_line_temp t where t.batch_number = #{batchNumber} and t.error_flag = 1 order by t.row_index asc

select t.*, ex.name as expenseTypeName from exp_adjust_line_temp t, exp_expense_type ex where t.batch_number = #{transactionNumber} and t.error_flag = 0 and t.expense_type_id = ex.id order by t.row_index asc
